data.WebService:: namespace which seemed just right since that's what the
data.description: methods to talk to the weblogs.com severs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I spent a while conidering Net::weblogUpdates, and
    UserLand::weblogsUpdate, Weblogsdotcom::weblogUpdates. I didn't
    really like any of them since they were too general, too specific
    and too much typing.

    I noticed that someone else had uploaded something in the
    WebService:: namespace which seemed just right since that's what the
    package wraps.

    WebService::weblogUpdates in a wrapper module that provides a
    simple OOP-ish interface for the weblogs.com "ping" service. The
    service is available in three flavours : XML-RPC, SOAP and REST.

    See also : http://perl.aaronland.info/webservice/weblog-updates/
